Architecture / App Type: Windows Server legacy app ('brown - field') migration to containers
ASP.NET 4 (MVC 5, Web API 2, and Web Forms)
WCF, WF, and other legacy frameworks
Linux containers: WCF in .NET Core (client library only) or CoreWCF
Windows Containers: .NET Framework WCF in .NET 7 (client library only) or CoreWCF

Linux containers: .NET 7 (eventually most Azure services will provide client SDKs for .NET 7)
Windows Containers: .NET Framework .NET 7 (eventually most Azure services will provide client SDKs for .NET 7)
